plot: He knows he is dreaming. What he doesn't know is the difference between his dreams and reality. To get things back to normal, he takes a risk or an opportunity.
title: Loophole
plot_es: He knows he is dreaming. What he doesn't know is the difference between his dreams and reality. To get things back to normal, he takes a risk or an opportunity.
plot_en: He knows he is dreaming. What he doesn't know is the difference between his dreams and reality. To get things back to normal, he takes a risk or an opportunity.
